message:
If you need any information in English of Taiwan 319 Protest Event, you can visit this website. We provide event photos, live stream and statements from all citizen reporters.

We're not mainstream media, but we speak the truth.

We also welcome volunteers who can help us to record this event.

Many thanks to CSSTATRANSLATEGROUP, 公民行動影音記錄資料庫, PTTRadio.
story: Toley Huang shared a link to the group: g0v.tw 後勤中心.
description: This is NOT an official press channel
name: The Night Before 319
caption: thenightbefore319.wordpress.com
